item.title: Turki Al Al Shikh: How his excellency is trying to bring back lost glory
item.description: In the world of boxing, where nostalgia often blends with present-day innovation, Turki Al Al Shikh has emerged as a pivotal figure in rekindling the sport’s golden era. As the chairman of the Saudi Arabian General Entertainment Authority, Al Al Shikh has spearheaded a renaissance in boxing, bringing back the grandeur and excitement that once defined the sport. Under Al Al Shikh’s stewardship, Saudi Arabia has transformed into a global boxing hub, hosting high-profile fights that have captivated audiences worldwide.

item.title: Crawford vs Madrimov
item.description: A Cautious Clash Ends in a Disappointing Display
